body_html:
Yes. That would be very helpful. Would you have a simple python script that shows the behavior? One thing to try: TF with MKL-DNN is now the default in the Anaconda repo. So try just 'conda install -c ananconda tensorflow'. And see if it works Best, Tony

One thing to try: TF with MKL-DNN is now the default in the Anaconda repo.
So try just 'conda install -c ananconda tensorflow'. And see if it works

body:
Yes. That would be very helpful. Would you have a simple python script that
shows the behavior?

One thing to try: TF with MKL-DNN is now the default in the Anaconda repo.
So try just 'conda install -c ananconda tensorflow'. And see if it works


Best,
Tony
